title: PM condoles over loss of lives in traffic accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 25 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Saturday expressed grief and sorrow over the loss of lives of thirteen persons in the traffic accident on Multan Sukkur Motorway.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to grant paradise to the departed souls and patience to the bereaved families.
He also prayed for the early recovery of the injured persons.
